AzureBlade: I am sorry... all of you... I want to rest for now... But 
please, promise me you won't torture him anymore... We are Maximals 
after all... I do not want to be part of his interrogation either...

He stood and transformed to dragon mode.

AzureBlade: I will go for some times. If you need to contact me... I 
will be in these whereabouts. (the coordinates correspond to northern 
Scotland) I need to take some distance. But I assure you I am, and 
forever will be, a Maximal. Prowl, should you need my blades, contact 
me. Farewell!

He takes off and transforms to jet mode. He takes speed and soon, is 
not seen in the horizon.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Starcasm6@a... wrote:
> ghost: Whooooa....
> goth: you need to back waaay the hell off, dragon-boy. look, he's 
not dead. 
> I'm not into the killing thing. it's the price you to pay to be a 
> sharpshooter. You need to drop the whole angsty/searching for 
redemption 
> thing. you killed. tough. get over it. that's what you do sometimes. 
but 
> don't jump on me because you feel guilty about your past.
